item.title: Cat Holocaust in china
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

I understand now, what you are saying Niall, I will admit, if I had nothing else to eat but a cat or a dog, I would eat it. I mean, we can’t(well can…)go around complaining about eatting cats and dog, then have people go off and eat cows/goats, which in some countrys if you do that, its a crime. Basicly the same thing.(just different animals.)

Read full topic

item.title: Cat Holocaust in china
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:45, topic:324763”]Not really.

Eating meat, and then eating a dog, or a cat.
Eh, I see that as a very different…[/quote]

There is no difference at all. You would still be killing an an animal for food, just because it is a cow doesn’t mean that it is morally correct.

[quote=“krackkid, post:47, topic:324763”][quote author=Niall link=topic=421115.msg3097634#msg3097634 date=1263479795]
Anyone who isn’t a vegan and posted something like “fucking chinese”, “this is disgusting” is a hypocrite.
[/quote]
Really, So you would eat a cat or a dog? over some beef.[/quote]

No, but I wouldn’t think any differently of people who eat cat or dog to those who eat cows.

Mitko: please refrain from posting NSFW material.

Read full topic

item.title: Cat Holocaust in china
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Jamie1200, post:48, topic:324763”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=421115.msg3097955#msg3097955 date=1263505691]

Anyone who isn’t a vegan and posted something like “fucking chinese”, “this is disgusting” is a hypocrite.

Really, So you would eat a cat or a dog? over some beef.
[/quote]

Its the nature over nuture debate. If your brought up eating dog and cat it’s morrally correct in their eyes, Nature tells you its wrong. and visa versa[/quote]

Nature doesn’t tell you it’s wrong. You were brought up thinking it is wrong to eat them. You are not born thinking it’s wrong to eat cats and dogs, but ok to eat cows or chickens. It’s just the way we are brought up in our western society. It is nurture, that tells you it is wrong. I am sure they used cats and/or dogs for food long before western culture existed.

Read full topic

item.title: Cat Holocaust in china
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

6,000,000 jewish people were killed in the holocaust, they were killed in gas chambers where SS men would lock them in a room and fill it with poisonous gas, and told them they were taking a shower. If this wasn’t the case then they would preform sick and cruel experiments on them, making a twin torture his brother, and other horrible unimaginable things. Guess what they used for bayonet practice? Fucking infants. How the fuck can you have a sick enough mind to make a thread like this?

W…what?

This is about CHINA…

Not Hitler.

Read full topic

Really, So you would eat a cat or a dog? over some beef.

Its the nature over nuture debate. If your brought up eating dog and cat it’s morrally correct in their eyes, Nature tells you its wrong. and visa versa
[/quote]
I know but still, if they came over to the USA and did that, they go to jail. Because of our fucked up law system.[/quote]How do you see it as fucked up? In China, it’s considered moral to kill your spouse. Are we going to let some chinks come to our country and kill their spouse too? I think definitely not.

yh i liek watching dick being cut off to, cats mutilated, people beheaded, beaten crap out of them, killing dogs with forks, recording myself modifying my body parts (dick for example), i whack my cat on the ground almost every day for joy, please tell me im sick pl0x? :o :o

item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

World population

In demographics, the world population is the total number of humans currently living, and was estimated to have reached 7.6 billion people as of May 2018. World population has experienced continuous growth since the end of the Great Famine of 1315–17 and the Black Death in 1350, when it was near 370 million. The highest population growth rates – global population increases above 1.8% per year – occurred between 1955 and 1975, peaking to 2.06% between 1965 and 1970. The growth rate has decline...

That is why they eat cats and dogs.

Read full topic
